message:
HD version of the E3 demo walkthrough:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hzemfq5c6Z0
So, was there any indication that FC3 will again be a fully open-world FPS like FC2?
No one seems to have said anything, but from what they did show in the video it seems probable that it would be open world again.

You know, it's actually quite remarkable, given the popularity of both open-world games and FPSs, that the two concepts haven't been joined more often.  In fact, I can't thing of any open-word FPS *but* FC2, offhand.
Nothing that's pure FPS at least. Games of that sort tend to lean towards RPG mechanics, see STALKER.
There was also Boiling Point. Granted, it wasn't a good game, but still.
Actually, STALKER's not got a lot of the RPG tropes you hate, Mr_V. You should probably try that.
Stalker has always been on that list of games that really piques my interest and that I'd probably try if it weren't for… you know… PC.
Ah, this is what I wanted to see -- agency! An alternate version of the E3 demo: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J1UFnUdX_xw&feature=youtu.be
